Senior guard Rashard Odomes dribbles past defenders during the game against West Virginia March  PERIOD

The Sooners make it the second round of the NCAA Tournament PERIOD

Oklahoma   Big  beat Ole Miss   SEC  with a flurry of offense Friday afternoon in Columbia South Carolina PERIOD The Sooners will now face the winner of No PERIOD  seed Virginia and No PERIOD  seed GardnerWebb PERIOD

It was a game of high offense for both teams but OUs four players with doubledigit scoring and  percent fieldgoal percentage were too much for the Rebels PERIOD

Senior forward Rashard Odomes stole the show with his  points while making four trips to the foul line  all of which were whistles after a made basket PERIOD Odomes finished the game  from the field PERIOD

Oklahomas next game will be Sunday with the time still to be determined PERIOD
